scene.name: Clamp bolt manipulation setup
scene.description: A metal C-clamp with a threaded eyebolt

task.name: Screw and unscrew the bolt
task.description: Rotate the eyebolt clockwise to screw it into the base, then counter-clockwise to unscrew it
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice threading the bolt. First, screw it all the way in, and then unscrew it.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要练习拧动螺栓。首先把它完全拧进去，然后再把它拧出来。

subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please screw and then unscrew the bolt from the frame.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请在支架上拧入并拧出螺栓。

steps.description: Screw the bolt into the base by rotating clockwise
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start screwing the bolt into the base.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：开始将螺栓拧入底座。

steps.description: Unscrew the bolt from the base by rotating counter-clockwise
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: start unscrewing the bolt from the base.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：开始将螺栓从底座拧起。

constraints.notes: Ensure smooth rotation along the thread axis; stop when resistance is felt at the end of the thread.
